title: Creating a new topic makes the boards check level again?
body: I'm trying to make a comment and I read this works.

replies.body: It can take a moment for your account to sync to the boards, but it looks like you're good to go now.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
It looks like you're currently level 30 so you should be able to post or comment anywhere. What board were you trying to comment on?
I still cannot comment on the other thread.
